5.9.17  4:42 pm   5.7.17 2:08 pm Would you release a chart that shows the amount of questions on this page per month or day or something represented as a line graph? - i am not the person who asked this but i made a graph for the questions you have answered per day from 2015 up through april 2017, it may be off by 1 or 2 for a few days but it should be mostly accurate, i hope: http://imgur.com/X4B6kFk (please note that it must be downloaded in order to view it at full size) as of april 30, 2017 that is a total of somewhere around 16,188 questions you had answered. here is the raw data i gathered in case anyone wants to compare notes: https://pastebin.com/vfimE2FY i also calculated that you have made 388 pages for most popular questions. best wishes while you are polishing up the new vid!
